{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Lima top.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = QCA4531 chipset based module |caption2 = with 650MHz CPU and 802.11n 2x2 (MIMO) radio |pp = https://www.8devices.com/products/lima |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = 8devices_Lima |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = 8devices |model = Lima |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -I |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/20/2017 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/8devices/8devices_lima |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = SoM, module |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Z9W-CM4 |icid = 11468A-CM4 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA4531; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 650 <!-- 650 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Serial(SPI) |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S25FL512SA;Images: 64MB - FL512SAIHC, 16MB - S25L127SIF1B ?; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128<!-- 64 x16 ! --> |ram1chip = Alliance Memory;AS4C64M16D2-25BIN; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.1.23;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 3.3 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/27/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *CPU: QCA4531 @650MHz WiSoC, 802.11bgn 2x2 (MIMO)

===Models=== :;[https://www.8devices.com/wiki/ Products] :<u>''Single band''</u> *[[8devices Carambola 2]] • [[Atheros]] AR9331, 16MB/64MB, 1T1R *[[8devices Centipede]] • [[Atheros]] AR9331, 16MB/64MB, 1T1R *[[8devices Kinkan]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8197FS, 32MB/128MB, 2T2R *[[8devices Lima]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA4531, 32MB/64MB, 2T2R :<u>''Dual-band''</u> *[[8devices Habanero]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019, 32MB/512MB, 2T2R, Wave2 *[[8devices Jalapeno]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018, 128MB/256MB, 2T2R, Wave2 *[[8devices Komikan]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8197FS/RTL8822BEH, 32MB/128MB, 2T2R, BT 4.1 *[[8devices Mango]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ6010/QCN5121/QCN5152, 32MB/512MB, 2T2R, Wi-Fi 6 *[[8devices Rambutan]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9557/QCA9550, 128MB/128MB, 2T2R :<u>''Radio modules''</u> *[[8devices BLACK bean]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377, 1T1R, BT, USB *[[8devices BLUE bean]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377, 1T1R, BT, USB *[[8devices RED bean]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377, 1T1R, SDIO 3.0, UART
